issue.title: [Java] Optimize ByteFunctionHelpers equals & compare logic
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5909](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5909). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now it first compare Long values and then if length < 8 then it compares Byte values.

Add the logic to compare Int values when 4 < length < 8.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5909?focusedCommentId=16884309) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4852
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4852>
